alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Briscoe; Castro; Lamb; Parmer; Swisher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 31 at 11:54AM CDT until May 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Bailey, Lamb, Briscoe, Castro, Parmer and Swisher. * WHEN...From 4 PM CDT this afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread heavy rainfall over the past several days has resulted in area soils becoming saturated. Additional heavy rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is possible this evening through tonight, with localized amounts in excess of 2 inches. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Bailey; Briscoe; Castro; Lamb; Parmer; Swisher
